items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy cloud like sweater
items.body: I was hesitant on this one....after the static wore off I immediately fell in love with this sweater, wore it out last night and got lots of compliments, and the touch is so soft feels like a cold wrapped around you. Heavy enough to keep you warm without suffocating you (I did have a shirt on under we were outside in the 30's but I barely needed my jacket at all and I am a big baby with the cold weather. I got black, and it looks great bold with a touch of light but in a good way super hard to describe that. It didn't pull at all when I wore it and my dog jumped on me would rate the quality very high. Love this sweater, might buy some more! Read more
items.author: Karen Kratzer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater for winter
items.body: This sweater is perfect for the holidays! I love that it is not too hot, but it still has some weight to it and feels warm. The fuzzy texture works well with it and doesnâ€™t feel cheap or scraggly. I got the white color and think it would look okay in black as well, but I canâ€™t imagine this sweater looking great in the grey, but thatâ€™s just me. I wore it with a red corduroy skirt and boots and I feel like it adds interest without being too crazy. It seems to match most outfits well and is a cute style all winter long. Read more
items.author: christie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ðŸ‘
items.body: The quality of this sweater is excellent. Itâ€™s a true oversized and the material is super thick and comfy. I love the color and itâ€™s the perfect to resized shape or fit. No piling or issues so far. You canâ€™t go wrong with this one!!! Read more
items.author: Carsen Frey

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Kinda fun. Pretty shaggy.
items.body: I am so torn on this sweater. I did not see that it was 100 percent nylon. But it is literally some of the softest material Iâ€™ve ever felt. Itâ€™s cozy but I think it feels a bit more hot than it is warm. Itâ€™s exactly as pictured. Def oversized. I love oversized but there is something that just feels sloppy. The weave is very shaggy, a bit too shagggy for me. Very obvious on gray. Maybe in black it looks a bit less ragged. I expected it to shed. It doesnâ€™t. Iâ€™m going to see if I can tuck it, belt it and salvage it. Read more
items.author: Yet another Whitney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft, beautiful, oversized Turtleneck Sweater!
items.body: I love the way this beautiful oversized fuzzy turtleneck sweater feels. It's incredibly soft and fuzzy. It feels so nice. The fabric is excellent quality. It's an oversized sweater so it's naturally very roomy and comfortable. I love the color. It looks so good paired with jeans and boots. It's a lovely turtleneck sweater to wear during fall and winter months. It keeps me warm. It's reasonably priced too. I'm very pleased with this sweater and I recommend it. I rate it a 5 out of 5.... Read more
items.author: Leila

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfy - Stay True to Size
items.body: Wyeysyt Oversized Turtleneck Sweater Fuzzy Knit, BEIGE, MEDIUM: Iâ€™m 5â€™2â€ 165lbs, 36â€ Waist, Shoulders 16â€, Upper Bust 43â€, Under Bust 36â€. I normally wear M/L in tops/sweaters. The medium fits me perfectly. I didnâ€™t want it to be too oversized, so I stayed true to size. This is a very warm sweater! It is so soft and comfy. I am also very sensitive to certain materials, and this sweater doesn't bother me at all. I like the style too. It looks exactly like the listing photos. Iâ€™m very happy. Value is good. Would recommend. Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, warm and fuzzy
items.body: Iâ€™ve been wearing this oversized turtleneck for a few cool evenings, and itâ€™s honestly one of the softest sweaters I own. The fuzzy knit feels super warm without being itchy, and the loose fit gives it that comfy, relaxed vibe I love for fall. It pairs easily with jeans or leggings, making it an easy throw-on piece when I want to feel cozy but still look put together. material was good quality, color is accurate, its not so thick but warm. Read more
items.author: JC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft, cozy, and perfect for chilly days!
items.body: I love this oversized turtleneck sweaterâ€”itâ€™s unbelievably soft, warm, and comfy without feeling heavy. The fit is relaxed in the best way, and itâ€™s easy to dress up with boots and jeans or keep casual with leggings. Great quality, super cozy, and perfect for cold weather. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Jennifer Bahr

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Beige, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
